questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A art mural or graffiti
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A street art mural
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) People
C) Graffiti art
D) Animals

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A large, colorful mural
C) A person
D) A vehicle

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Skyscrapers
B) Ocean waves
C) A painted wall with graffiti
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) A painted wall
C) A bench
D) A bicycle

What kind of art is depicted in the photo?
A) Classical painting
B) Digital art
C) Street art
D) Sculptures

What colors are predominantly used in the mural?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) Black and white
D) Pastel shades

What is the texture of the wall in the photo?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and cracked
C) Glossy and reflective
D) Soft and furry

What can be seen on the left side of the mural?
A) A forest scene
B) A building with windows
C) A river
D) A car

What is the signature visible in the mural?
A) "John Doe"
B) "Marcozo Pax"
C) "Art Lover"
D) "Street Artist"

What does the diamond shape represent in the mural?
A) Wealth
B) Nature
C) Technology
D) Art

What is the style of the artwork?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Impressionist
D) Minimalist

What kind of lines are used in the mural?
A) Straight lines
B) Curved lines
C) Zigzag lines
D) Broken lines

What is the dominant theme of the mural?
A) Urban life
B) Nature
C) Fantasy
D) History

What is the overall composition of the mural?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Radial
D) Geometric

What is the color of the character with a diamond on its face?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Green

What kind of elements are mixed in the mural?
A) Geometric and organic
B) Digital and analog
C) Natural and artificial
D) Historical and modern

What is the texture of the character with a diamond on its face?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Furry
D) Metallic

What is the color of the paper airplane?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Black, yellow and purple

What is the color of the element that looks like a paper boat?
A) White
B) Yellow
C) Pink
D) Black

What kind of shapes are used in the mural?
A) Organic shapes
B) Geometric shapes
C) Abstract shapes
D) Realistic shapes

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A natural landscape
B) A group of people
C) Mural artwork
D) Animals in the wild

What kind of colors are mainly used in the graffiti?
A) Monochrome shades
B) Earthy tones
C) Bright and pastel colors
D) Dark and muted colors

What is one of the noticeable features in the graffiti?
A) A large tree
B) A diamond shape
C) A sports car
D) A family crest

What type of structure is seen in the left part of the photo?
A) A modern skyscraper
B) A series of smaller, colorful buildings
C) A large mansion
D) A bridge

What kind of artistic style is the graffiti?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Impressionistic
D) Classical
